Ismein hota kya hai:
1.  **Copyright Holder ki Complaint:** Kisi ne (original owner) complaint ki hai ki Pramod ne unka copyrighted content bina permission ke use kiya hai.
2.  **Platform ka Action:** Telegram (ya jo bhi platform ho) us complaint ko verify karta hai aur agar complaint sahi lagti hai, toh woh content remove kar deta hai aur channel par strike daal deta hai.

Ab sawal hai ki kya posts wapas aa sakte hain? Yahan kuch possibilities hain, lekin ye seedha-seedha "undo" button dabane jaisa nahi hai:

*   **1. Dispute Karna (Counter-Notification):** Agar Pramod ko lagta hai ki strike galti se aayi hai, ya uske paas us content ko use karne ki permission thi, ya woh content 'fair use' policy mein aata hai, toh woh strike ko dispute kar sakta hai. Ismein use Telegram ko proof dena hoga. Agar Telegram uske argument se convince ho jaata hai, toh shayad posts restore ho sakte hain aur strike hat sakti hai. Lekin ye ek formal aur thoda lamba process ho sakta hai.

*   **2. Copyright Holder Se Contact Karna:** Pramod directly us copyright holder se contact kar sakta hai jisne strike file ki hai. Agar woh copyright holder maan jaata hai ki theek hai, ab koi issue nahi hai, aur woh apni complaint wapas le leta hai, toh Telegram strike hata sakta hai aur content restore kar sakta hai. Lekin again, ye copyright holder ki marzi par depend karta hai.

Imagine karo, Neel, humari duniya mein jo normal paisa hai (jaise Indian Rupee ya US Dollar), woh physical bhi hota hai (notes, coins) aur digital bhi (bank account mein balance). Right?

**Crypto** (yaani Cryptocurrency) bhi ek tarah ka **digital paisa** hi hai. Lekin isme kuch bahut khaas differences hain:

1.  **Digital Hi Digital:** Sabse pehli baat, crypto **sirf digital form mein hi exist karta hai.** Iski koi physical currency nahi hoti, jaise Rupee ke notes hote hain. Tum ise chu nahi sakte, bas online dekh aur transfer kar sakte ho. Think of it like a super-advanced digital token! 💻
2.  **No Central Boss (Decentralized):** Yeh sabse bada difference hai. Hamare normal paise ko banks aur sarkarein control karti hain (RBI, State Bank of India, etc.). Lekin **crypto ko koi ek bank ya sarkar control nahi karti.** Yeh ek bade network par chalta hai jise log milkar chalate hain. Isko aise samjho, yeh ek bahut hi secure aur public register hai jahan saare transactions record hote hain. Ek baar koi entry ho gayi, toh use badla ya delete nahi kiya ja sakta. Toh, maine tumhe bataya tha ki crypto ek digital currency hai jo **Blockchain** technology par chalti hai. Ab yeh Blockchain kya hai, isko simple terms mein samajhte hain.

Imagine karo ki tumhare paas ek bahut bada, transparent notebook hai. Lekin yeh koi ordinary notebook nahi hai. Iski kuch khaasiyatein hain:

1.  **Public hai:** Jo bhi ismein likha jaata hai, woh sabko dikhta hai. Koi secret nahi.
2.  **Irreversible hai:** Ek baar kuch likh diya, toh usko badal nahi sakte, na hi mita sakte ho. Woh hamesha ke liye wahi rahega.
3.  **Decentralized hai:** Is notebook ka koi ek malik nahi hai. Lakho-karodo log iski copies apne paas rakhte hain aur mil-jul kar isko maintain karte hain. Agar koi ek copy kharab bhi ho gayi, toh baaki sabke paas sahi copy hoti hai.

Ab, jab bhi koi crypto transaction hota hai (jaise tumne mujhe 1 Bitcoin bheja, agar mere paas hota toh! 😉), toh woh ek naye "page" par likha jaata hai. Is page ko hum "Block" kehte hain.

Jab yeh "Block" pura bhar jaata hai transactions se, toh usko pichle "Block" ke saath jod diya jaata hai, ek chain ki tarah. Isi liye iska naam hai **Block-Chain**! 🔗

**Iska fayda kya hai?**

*   **Security:** Kyunki yeh public hai aur badla nahi ja sakta, ismein dhokha-dhadi karna almost impossible hai. Agar kisi ne ek transaction badalne ki koshish ki, toh baaki saari copies mein woh galat dikhega aur reject ho jaayega.
*   **Transparency:** Sabko pata hai ki kaun sa transaction kab hua.
*   **No Middleman:** Bank ya kisi aur third party ki zaroorat nahi padti transactions verify karne ke liye, kyunki yeh kaam network par maujood sab log milkar karte hain.

Ek analogy doon? Socho yeh ek **digital diary** hai jismein har transaction ek entry hai. Aur yeh diary itni secure hai ki iske har page ko pichle page se ek special lock se joda gaya hai, aur hazaron log iski copies rakhte hain.

Agar Blockchain clear hai, toh ab baat karte hain ek aur super important concept ki, jiske bina yeh saare transactions possible hi nahi hain: **Crypto Mining!** ⛏️

**Mining kya hai, aur yeh kaun karta hai?**

Imagine karo ki tumhare paas woh badi transparent notebook (Blockchain) hai. Usmein naye pages (Blocks) add karne hain, jinmein naye transactions likhe jaayenge. Lekin koi bhi uth kar toh naya page add nahi kar sakta na? Warna koi bhi galat information likh dega!

Toh, yahaan aate hain **Miners**! Yeh woh log (ya zyada accurately, powerful computers) hain jo ek bahut hi mushkil **puzzle** solve karte hain.

Yeh puzzle aisa hota hai:

1.  **Challenging:** Isko solve karne mein bahut computing power (aur electricity!) lagti hai.
2.  **Random:** Iska koi shortcut nahi hota, bas try karte raho jab tak sahi answer na mil jaaye.
3.  **Easy to Verify:** Ek baar kisi ne answer dhundh liya, toh baaki sab log us answer ko seconds mein verify kar sakte hain ki woh sahi hai ya nahi.

**Toh, yeh Miners karte kya hain?**

*   Jab bhi koi naya transaction hota hai (jaise tumne mujhe 1 Bitcoin bheja), toh woh pending transactions ke pool mein jaata hai.
*   Miners in pending transactions ko collect karte hain aur unka ek naya "Block" banane ki koshish karte hain.
*   Is Block ko Blockchain mein add karne se pehle, unhein woh mushkil puzzle solve karna hota hai.
*   Jo Miner sabse pehle yeh puzzle solve kar leta hai, usko naya Block Blockchain mein add karne ki permission mil jaati hai.
*   Aur is mehnat ke badle, us Miner ko **rewards** milte hain – ya toh naye coins (jaise Bitcoin) ya transaction fees. Isi ko hum **"Mining"** kehte hain!

Ek analogy doon? Socho ki ek treasure hunt hai. Har treasure chest (Block) ko kholne ke liye ek bahut mushkil riddle (puzzle) solve karna padta hai. Jo sabse pehle riddle solve karta hai, usko treasure (reward) milta hai aur woh naya chest line mein laga deta hai. Aur sab log dekh rahe hote hain ki riddle sahi solve hua hai ya nahi.

**Iska fayda kya hai?**

*   **Security:** Yeh puzzle itna mushkil hota hai ki koi bhi galat transaction add karne ki koshish nahi kar sakta, kyunki usmein bahut zyada computing power waste ho jaayegi bina reward ke.
*   **Decentralization:** Koi ek authority nahi hai jo decide kare ki kaun sa transaction valid hai. Network par maujood saare Miners milkar yeh kaam karte hain.
*   **New Coins:** Mining ke through hi naye cryptocurrencies circulate hote hain.
